lines.text:
[referring to Elmer]
Gee, what a sorehead. I've hoid about professional jealousy among actors, but that dope has got it real bad.

[chasing Bugs]
Hey, you come back here!
Oh, no. You huwt my feelings.
[Bugs had been asked by the QTTV producer to climb to the top of a ladder and sit down on the cushion on the very top of it]
What's sitting up here on this cushion got to do with my television career?
Well, you see, most people have to start at the bottom of the ladder. But we're starting you at the top. We like you.
